artistic_prompt:
Create a gallery-quality artistic masterpiece representing "Citation-based search implementation" with these specifications:
        
        ARTISTIC VISION:
        - Renaissance composition meets cutting-edge digital art precision
        - Cyberpunk minimalism with academic authority
        - Visual narrative of transformation from traditional to AI-powered future
        
        VISUAL COMPOSITION:
        - Left: Fading traditional search results (monochrome, dated)
        - Center: Dynamic transformation energy flow (vibrant, kinetic)
        - Right: Luminous AI-powered interface (colorful, interactive)
        
        COLOR PALETTE:
        Primary: #0066cc, #00ffff, #ff6600, #ffffff
        Brand accent: #1e3a8a (IMI WORK navy)
        
        STYLE DIRECTION:
        - cyberpunk minimalism meets academic precision
        - Museum-worthy visual storytelling
        - Photorealistic precision meets conceptual art
        - innovative, cutting-edge, intellectually stimulating
        
        TECHNICAL SPECS:
        - Resolution: 800x450 pixels
        - Gallery exhibition quality
        - Professional marketing readiness
        - Mobile-optimized clarity
        
        BRAND INTEGRATION:
        - Subtle "SENSE & AI" philosophy embodiment
        - Korean business context sensitivity
        - 15-year F&B expertise credibility markers
        - IMI WORK professional authority
        
        Create an image that elevates business concepts to high art, making AEO strategy visually compelling and emotionally resonant.
